video.title: Worst Year of My Life, Again
video.synopsis: After a school year filled with humiliation, bullying and girl trouble, a boy awakens to find that time has reset itself and he must relive it all.

episodes.synopsis: On the morning of his birthday, Alex King wakes up to discover that time has reset itself, and he is about to relive the worst year of his life.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Valentine's Day offers Alex the perfect opportunity to woo the girl of his dreams, but his declaration of love ends up in the wrong hands.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: At the lifesaving club's fundraiser, Alex goes too far irking his nemesis, Mr. Norris, and faces extreme punishment. Can he fix it this time around?
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Alex is tired of being Simon's April Fools' target and being humiliated in front of his classmates. Can he use his loop year to turn the tables?
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Alex and his sister, Sam, are left home alone for the night, they decide there's only one way to spend the time: throw a house party!
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Alex arrives late to his math lesson, so Mr. Norris punishes the whole class by giving them a test, making Alex the most unpopular person in school.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the big soccer game, Alex causes a major mix-up in a sports store, so it's up to his soccer-mad dad to step in and save the day.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Alex sets his mind on beating the other boys in a cross-country race, even if he has to cheat and go along with Simon's underhanded plan.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Alex is thrilled when he gets the chance to play Romeo opposite Nicola's Juliet in the school play. Can he finally plant a kiss on his dream girl?
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Alex creates a cool costume to wear to Nicola's Halloween celebration, but can he get to the party and all its treats without getting tricked?
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Alex seizes a rare opportunity to win Nicola over when he's presented with a chance to score concert tickets for her favorite band.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Alex does everything in his power to speed up his mother's Christmas Day plans so that he can get to Nicola's beach barbecue party.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: When Alex finally musters the courage to ask Nicola to be his girlfriend, he's determined to get her alone, no matter what might arise.
episodes.title: Episode 13
